attributes.action: remove the BBC Television Licence Tax from the list of costs covered by the second home allowances available to elected members of the House of Commons and cause every single one of them who ever claimed for paying the BBC Television Licence Tax to pay it back into the public purse.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is the reprehensible act of an utterly depraved individual, or organisation, to cause, through punitive taxation, people to be criminalised when they are not able to afford to pay the BBC Television Licence Tax and then for the people who cause to the problem to be allowed to take money out of the public purse to pay their own BBC Television Licence Tax.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
